Filters

Class MedianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Filters.MedianFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter<java.lang.Float>

    public class MedianFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter<java.lang.Float>
    This class implements a windowed median filter.
